lore: An enthusiastic master of dark sorcery, Veigar has embraced powers that few mortals dare approach. As a free-spirited inhabitant of Bandle City, he longed to push beyond the limitations of yordle magic, and turned instead to arcane texts that had been hidden away for thousands of years. Now a stubborn creature with an endless fascination for the mysteries of the universe, Veigar is often underestimated by othersâ€”but even though he believes himself truly evil, he possesses an inner morality that leads some to question his deeper motivations.
title: the Tiny Master of Evil

allytips: Use Event Horizon to increase your chances of landing Dark Matter.
Veigar is extremely Mana and Cooldown Reduction dependent. Try buying items with these stats in order to increase the effectiveness of your passive and Baleful Strike.
Veigar is very fragile. It is valuable to select at least one summoner spell that can be used defensively.

passive.name: Phenomenal Evil Power
passive.description: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

enemytips: Dark Matter deals very high damage, but it can be avoided. Pay attention to the sound and visual indicator to be aware of when and where the spell will land.
Event Horizon only stuns units on the edge. If you're inside the spell, you can still move and attack.
Veigar's ultimate deals increased damage based on your missing health.
name: Veigar

spells.name: Baleful Strike
spells.description: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes a bolt of dark energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first two enemies hit.

Killing a unit with this also grants Veigar a stack of Phenomenal Evil. Large minions and large monsters grant two.

spells.name: Dark Matter
spells.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Every 50 stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown by 10% (currently {{ f2.0*100 }}%).

spells.name: Event Horizon
spells.description: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.
spells.sanitizedDescription: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.
spells.tooltip: After a {{ e2 }} second delay, Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, forming a pentagon of walls. Enemies who attempt to pass through the perimeter are stopped and stunned for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

Damage is maximized against enemies below 33% health.
